name: Loki: Agent of Asgard #5
summary: - Nobody else would have done it - because nobody else would have the nerve! Loki's crew comes together to crack the deepest dungeons of Asgardia itself! - It's the ultimate caper - but is there one plot twist too many for even the God of Trickery to handle? - This movie rated :( for tears before bedtime.

relations.title: Loki: Agent of Asgard Volume 1: Trust Me
